entry.title: He keeps me warm

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,740Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Lia has lots of issues, IED and childhood trauma being only the biggest ones. Now in a new town, in a different state than her parents sheâ€™s working in the industry that accepted her with no papers or hang ups about her age. Building a life here could be so good for her healing process, but could something be following her from home?
